item.title: Pirates fire grenades and board vessel off Somali coast
item.description: The attack comes amid a resurgence of piracy in the region in recent days.

item.title: Cars in German city found smeared with swastikas in blood, police say
item.description: Cars, walls and postboxes have been defaced, in what appears to be human blood.

item.title: Miss Universe contestants stage walkout after organiser berates Miss Mexico
item.description: Miss Mexico, Fatima Bosch, said Nawat Itsaragrisil was 'not respectful' at a pre-pageant ceremony on Tuesday

item.title: Israel says Hamas returned body of dead Tanzanian hostage
item.description: Joshua Mollel, a 21-year-old agriculture student, was killed at Kibbutz Nir Oz during the Hamas-led 7 October 2023 attack on Israel.

item.title: South Africans trapped in Donbas after joining Russia-Ukraine war, Ramaphosa says
item.description: It is unclear whether the citizens were fighting on behalf of Russia or Ukraine.
